title: Sample, 1956
medium:
Medium: synthetic fiber
Technique: plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 16.5 x 21 cm (6 1/2 x 8 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description:
Plain weave with paired and unpaired warps and paired wefts. 
Warp: 2 green alternate with 2 red 2 ply yarns.
Weft: orange 2 ply yarns paired with flat metallic yarns in silver, gold and red.
